author: andyc
msg: Minor change to avoid other errors when using continue-after-fatal-error.

author: andyc
msg: Fixed bug in namespace binder that allowed prefixed attribute
names (e.g. "xmlns:"+NCName) to have an empty value. This in
turn caused other misleading errors to be reported.

msg: 2. provided a solid substitution support for validation;
